name: Thermal refugia
functionStatement: Shade, solar input, and groundwater keep temperature and light within natural ranges for stream metabolism and dissolved oxygen.
descriptionMarkdown: Springs or deeper pools temper extremes, unless large daily swings are historically normal (arid ephemeral).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Locate cooler pockets or deeper pools using a field temperature check or loggers where available.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Multiple cooler pockets or deeper pools provide refugia during warm periods.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: No refugia where expected. High thermal stress risk.

references: mapped springs/seeps and baseflow indices (where available).
